sentences.sContent: The infringement exists even if the infringer did not know about the patent.
sentences.sContent_eng: The infringement exists even if the infringer did not know about the patent.
sentences.sCn: 即使侵权人不了解专利侵权依然存在。

sentences.sContent: Article 3 The infringee shall have the right to request the infringer to assume tort liability.
sentences.sContent_eng: Article 3 The infringee shall have the right to request the infringer to assume tort liability.
sentences.sCn: 第三条被侵权人有权请求侵权人承担侵权责任。

sentences.sContent: When the administrative authority for patent affairs handling the matter considers that the infringement is established, it may order the infringer to stop the infringing act immediately.
sentences.sContent_eng: When the administrative authority for patent affairs handling the matter considers that the infringement is established, it may order the infringer to stop the infringing act immediately.
sentences.sCn: 管理专利工作的部门处理时，认定侵权行为成立的，可以责令侵权人立即停止侵权行为。
